nodeMetric.field_description: Page Views is a count of the number of times the content of a page is loaded or re-loaded. Page Views by Source is a subset of total Page Views and counts the number of page views, segmented by source.

body.summary: Page Views is a count of the number of times the content of a page is loaded or re-loaded. Page Views by Source is a subset of total Page Views and counts the number of page views, segmented by source.

field_related_metrics.field_description: Page Views by Age, a subset of total Page Views, is a count of the number of page views, segmented by age bracket. Page Views is a count of the number of times the content of a page is loaded or re-loaded.
Page Views, as commonly used with Google Analytics, is the count of times the content of a page is loaded or re-loaded.

Page Views by Gender, a subset of total Page Views, is a count of the number of page views, segmented by gender. Page Views is a count of the number of times the content of a page is loaded or re-loaded.
